text.p: NumereX Corp said Thursday that it has sold all of the stock of its wholly owned subsidiary, DA Systems Ltd, to Detection Systems Inc. for 226,168 shares of DSI valued at $17.00 per share. In addition, NumereX retained $2.3 million of cash.
NumereX said it has been granted registration rights and can require Detection Systems to repurchase the shares on July 1, 1998, for $3.9 million plus interest.

In a companion transaction, the company said one of its subidiaries entered into a license agreement with Detection Systems for it to manufacture and supply certain products in return for royalty payments.
NumereX designs, manufactures and markets its proprietary alarm reporting system and offers a line of broadband communications products and services, and network management systems.
